Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near Cottage Grove/67th
ShortDescription: 67th-69th-71rrtd EB via 67th, St. Lawrence, Marquette, Cott Grv & 67th; WB via 67th, Cott Grv, Marquette, Rhodes & 67th due to police activity nr Cott Grov/67th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Cottage Grove/67th.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, St. Lawrence, Marquette, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 67th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Rhodes, then resume their normal route on 67th.

Allow extra travel time.
